# Feature Pull Request

## Feature Summary
Briefly describe the new feature and its purpose.

## Motivation
Why is this feature needed?  
Explain the problem it solves or the improvement it introduces.

## Implementation Details
Describe how the feature was implemented:
- Key components
- Important design decisions
- Any noteworthy logic

## Screenshots / Examples (if applicable)
Add screenshots, API examples, or usage examples that help reviewers understand.

## How to Test
1. Step one
2. Step two
3. Expected behavior

## Dependencies / Migrations
List any new dependencies, environment variables, or database migrations.

## Checklist
- [ ] Feature implemented fully
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] No breaking changes
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] Ready for review
